sections.section_title: Explore the features that help your team succeed

items.title: Inbox
items.description: Capture every vital detail from emails, Slack, and more directly into your Trello Inbox.

items.title: Planner
items.description: Sync your calendar and allocate focused time slots to boost productivity.

items.title: Automation
items.description: Automate tasks and workflows with Trello.

items.title: Power-Ups
items.description: Power up your teams by linking their favorite tools with Trello plugins.

items.title: Templates
items.description: Give your team a blueprint for success with easy-to-use templates from industry leaders and the Trello community.

items.title: Integrations
items.description: Find the apps your team is already using or discover new ways to get work done in Trello.

sections.section_title: Take a page out of these pre-built Trello playbooks designed for all teams

items.title: Marketing teams
items.description: Whether launching a new product, campaign, or creating content, Trello helps marketing teams succeed.

items.title: Product management
items.description: Use Trello’s management boards and roadmap features to simplify complex projects and processes.

items.title: Engineering teams
items.description: Ship more code, faster, and give your developers the freedom to be more agile with Trello.

items.title: Design teams
items.description: Empower your design teams by using Trello to streamline creative requests and promote more fluid cross-team collaboration.

items.title: Startups
items.description: From hitting revenue goals to managing workflows, small businesses thrive with Trello.

items.title: Remote teams
items.description: Keep your remote team connected and motivated, no matter where they’re located around the world.

items.title: Use case: Task management
items.description: Track progress of tasks in one convenient place with a visual layout that adds ‘ta-da’ to your to-do’s.

items.title: Use case: Resource hub
items.description: Save hours when you give teams a well-designed hub to find information easily and quickly.

items.title: Use case: Project management
items.description: Keep projects organized, deadlines on track, and teammates aligned with Trello.

items.title: Trello guide
items.description: Our easy to follow workflow guide will take you from project set-up to Trello expert in no time.

items.title: Remote work guide
items.description: The complete guide to setting up your team for remote work success.

items.title: Webinars
items.description: Enjoy our free Trello webinars and become a productivity professional.

items.title: Customer stories
items.description: See how businesses have adopted Trello as a vital part of their workflow.

items.title: Developers
items.description: The sky's the limit in what you can deliver to Trello users in your Power-Up!

items.title: Help resources
items.description: Need help? Articles and FAQs to get you unstuck.
